name: Protector of the People
description: You have vowed to construct a defender for your community.
prerequisites: Your community has come under persecution and requires considerable defense, or you have the Raiders, the Righting a Wrong, The War, or The Way Things Work background (all of which are found in Ultimate Campaign)
benefit: You temporarily gain the Craft Construct feat for  the purposes of building one golem to satisfy the goal of this story feat. You do not need to meet Craft Construct’s prerequisites, and it can’t be used as a prerequisite for any other crafting endeavor.
